alert.note: Alert for Sullivan (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Binghamton (South Central New York and Northeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 15 at 6:31PM EDT by NWS Binghamton
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Sullivan County through 700 PM EDT... At 631 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Hartwood, or near Monticello, moving east at 15 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Monticello, Wurtsboro, Bloomingburg, Haven, Phillipsport, Kiamesha, Rock Hill, Highview, Thompsonville and Hartwood. This includes the following highway exits... Interstate 86/Route 17 between 104 and 114. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
